title: RTL Nederland Makes Weather Forecasting Fast, Reliable and Sustainable with Help From Akamai
description: Media giant RTL Nederland offers a weather app that gives users the ability to get a comprehensive overview of the weather in their location at the click of a button. Akamai is delighted that this exciting media brand has chosen us to deliver a rich and engaging web experience for its viewers while providing a sustainable infrastructure via our Akamai Intelligent Edge Platform.
author: Ina Christova
